channel.title: Pple got problem to get into my server!
channel.description:
Hello u all :)
I got an problem , that pple r comeing online , then they get Disconnected and server tells that they r already online . And NOBODY cant get in now :S
Here is the text:
[code]Connection accepted from cpe-071-076-187-229.triad.res.rr.com: 49632. Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:346) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:33)[/code]
And a Picture :
[IMG]http://i28.tinypic.com/ipawsl.jpg[/img]
Can Somebody help me out please . It's really annoying . + Pple wants to play :/
